General.Name: JinkoSolar Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Jinko Solar Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, production, and marketing of photovoltaic products and integrated clean energy solutions worldwide. It serves utility, commercial, and residential customers. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China. Jinko Solar Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of JinkoSolar Holding Co., Ltd.
